channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-13661] Correct binary compatibility issues discovered in 1.1.0RC0
item.description:
Over on the 1.1.0RC0 VOTE thread, Enis discovered some errors in InterfaceAudience annotations. Let's fix them.

Filed by Nick Dimiduk on Enis Soztutar's behalf.
item.summary: Correct binary compatibility issues discovered in 1.1.0RC0

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Simple patch which fixes a couple of things:

  • Bring back RegionLocator to HTable. Let's keep it in branch-1 since 1.0 is like this.
  • Bring back Scan.HINT_LOOKAHEAD, not used anymore.
  • AuthUtil and proc v2 classes and NamespaceAuditor from Public to Private
  • ServerLoad had the change of int -> long for getReadRequestCount. It is not strictly compatible, but it is a required bug fix. I think we need the same fix for total request count as well which the patch contains.

This is intended for branch-1. The master patch should not contain the HTable and Scan changes in here.

Here's the compat report I get with this patch applied to the next rc, with line-by-line comments:

removed methods, ServerLoad

Enis Soztutar justified these in his above comment.

removed methods, AuthUtil

Made private by this patch

removed methods, AccessController

This class is LimitedPrivate(HBaseInterfaceAudience.CONFIG)

removed methods, ReplicationEndpoint.Context

Class is LimitedPrivate(HBaseInterfaceAudience.REPLICATION); the constructor itself is marked a Private.

removed methods, RegionObserver

These are related to the new Region interface, acceptable.

removed methods, RegionScanner

This class is marked Evolving and is LimitedPrivate(HBaseInterfaceAudience.COPROC), so this change is acceptable.

Problems with Data Types, High Severity, ZooKeeperWatcher

This class is Private; recompilation from 1.0.x to 1.1.x is excepted.

Problems with Data Types, High Severity, RegionObserver

Already mentioned, above.

Problems with Data Types, High Severity, HRegion

This class is Private; recompilation from 1.0.x to 1.1.x is excepted.

Problems with Data Types, High Severity, HRegionServer

LimitedPrivate(HBaseInterfaceAudience.TOOLS); recompilation expected.

Problems with Data Types, High Severity, RegionScanner

Addressed above

Problems with Methods, High Severity, HMaster

Class is restricted to LimitedPrivate(HBaseInterfaceAudience.TOOLS)

Problems with Methods, High Severity, Store

Class is Evolving, change permitted.

Problems with Data Types, Medium Severity, RpcServerInterface

Recompilation is expected.

Problems with Data Types, Medium Severity, RegionScanner

Recompilation is expected.

Other Changes in Data Types

All these are added methods, which is permitted in minor releases.

http://people.apache.org/~ndimiduk/1.0.1_branch-1.1.0_compat_report.html#Binary_Removed

+1

Here is the master patch. It is the same as branch-1.1 patch without the HTable and Scan changes.

hadoopqa is not working today it seems. Will commit these shortly for the 1.1.0RC.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12732098/hbase-13661_v1-master.patch
against master branch at commit 59a6e031fb20c8455d897b4ee2526b61224af961.
ATTACHMENT ID: 12732098

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

-1 tests included. The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

-1 patch. The patch command could not apply the patch.

Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/14024//console
